li.label: Sucker
li.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and {PAWN_nameDef} is that sucker.

li.label: Amateur Haggler
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to haggle. {PAWN_pronoun} gets better prices than most people.

li.label: Haggling Enthusiast
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.

li.label: Awkward
li.description: The elephant in the room is named {PAWN_nameDef}.

li.label: Tucker
li.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - {PAWN_nameDef}, probably.

li.label: Melodic Voice
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.

li.label: Uncouth
li.description: Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, {PAWN_nameDef} is not.

li.label: Diplomatic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.

li.label: Very diplomatic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has such a way with {PAWN_objective} words and gifts that {PAWN_pronoun} always manages to cool down a tense situation.

li.label: Shooting Amateur
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has never held a gun in {PAWN_objective} hands. The weight of the cold metal in {PAWN_objective} hands makes {PAWN_pronoun} shudder uncontrollably.

li.label: Shooting Professional
li.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - {PAWN_nameDef}, probably.
